title: #132: Where We Are Heading
description:
You donâ€™t have to be Nostradamus to see where things are heading in the world these days. The World Economic Forum has announced that they are running yet another simulation during July, this time to simulate a cyber attack. Obviously, we should be expecting an actual cyber attack to be not too far behind.

Inflation of the money supply has been happening forever, but in the past two years the amount of US Dollars in existence has grown by 40%, and if Biden has his way that number will increase. Supply chain issues seem to be the newest trend, the COVID op has stalled out and now Fauci & Gates are been thrown directly under the bus.

What else do they have planned for us this year? Should we be expecting an early Christmas present from our overlords or are the people going to rise up and put an end to this insanity? Only time will tell.
